name: Apple iPhone 14
description: Experience the power of the Apple A15 Bionic chip, advanced dual-camera system, 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, and all-day battery life. 5G capable with iOS 16.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22
description: Flagship Android smartphone featuring a 6.1-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset, pro-grade camera system, and long-lasting battery with fast charging.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with premium sound quality. Up to 30 hours of battery life, touch controls, and comfortable over-ear design for long listening sessions.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: Ultra-thin and fast laptop powered by Appleâ€™s M2 chip. 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, fanless design, silent performance, and up to 18 hours of battery life.

name: Canon EOS 1500D DSLR Camera
description: 24.1 MP APS-C CMOS sensor with DIGIC 4+ image processor. Full HD video recording, built-in Wi-Fi, and compatibility with a wide range of EF lenses.

name: OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite
description: A balanced mid-range phone with a 108 MP camera, 5000 mAh battery, and Snapdragon 695 5G chipset.

name: Logitech MX Master 3 Mouse
description: High-performance wireless mouse with ultra-fast scrolling, ergonomic design, and app-specific customizations.

name: GoPro HERO11 Black
description: Compact waterproof action camera with 5.3K60 Ultra HD video, HyperSmooth stabilization, and front+rear LCD screens.

name: HP DeskJet Ink Advantage 2331 Printer
description: All-in-one color printer with print, scan, and copy features. Ideal for home use with USB connectivity.
